benefits.title: Benefits of Booking Bus Tickets Online
benefits.paragraph1: Online bus ticket booking is easy, fast, and hassle-free. Travler offers user-friendly app and website navigation. Travler has resolved many issues that people encounter while booking tickets at offline counters or through travel agents.
benefits.paragraph2: Download the Travler App to experience the benefits of bus ticket booking online.
benefits.intro: Here is a list of all the benefits of booking bus tickets online on Travler:

list.item1: Avoid standing in long queues at offline bus ticket counters.
list.item2: No more hassle of approaching travel agents.
list.item5: Get bus timings, ticket price, boarding & dropping point details online.
list.item6: Access to payment partner discounts and cashback offers.
list.item8: Each and every transaction is simple, safe and secure.

faqs.title: FAQs related to Bus Tickets Booking

q1.question: Can i travel with children?
q1.answer: A passenger is allowed only one baby for free. The age limit is 5 years. Children above 5 years are required to pay for their seats

q2.question: How much luggage is required?
q2.answer: 20kgs of luggage is allowed free. Additional will be accepted on a charge if space permits

q1.question: How do I book my ticket on TRAVLER?
q1.step1.desc: Enter your travel details (From, To, Date) and click Search.
q1.step1.note: Note: "Sorry, no seat available" means the buses are fully booked.
q1.step2.desc: Click "View Seats" and proceed choose your preferred seat(s).
q1.step3.desc: Select your Pick Point and Drop Point from available options.
q1.step4.desc: Continue as Guest and fill in your personal information.
q1.step5.opt2: Click Payment button → enter PIN in phone pop-up

q2.question: Can I change the date of my journey after I have booked a bus ticket
q2.answer: Yes, cancellation and rescheduling options are available based on the bus operator’s policy.
q2.step3: 3. Select the trip and click  reschedule
q2.step4: 4. Proceed to input your desired changes

q3.question: How do i book using a voucher code
q3.step2: 2. Click the profile button at the bottom of the screen.
q3.step3: 3. Select wallet, click Redeem Voucher, and enter your code.
q3.step4: 4. Amount is successfully loaded into your account.
q3.step5: 5.  Book using the usual booking process and select Pay from Wallet at the last step.

q1.question: What are the different payment options available for bus ticket booking?
q1.answer: The payment methods available on TRAVLER are Mpesa for Kshs, Airtel Money for UGX, and Tigo & Vodacom for TSHS
